subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In his first game at Madison Square Garden, John Wall scored 25 points, including 12 of Kentucky’s last 15, as the fourth-ranked Wildcats beat No. 14 Connecticut.
snippet: In his first game at Madison Square Garden, John Wall scored 25 points, including 12 of Kentucky’s last 15, as the fourth-ranked Wildcats beat No. 14 Connecticut.
